Option: general.demo_msg

This option should contain a string with a message to the users.

If the setting general.demo is set to true this message will be displayed for the user when he tries to access a function during demonstration mode.

Example of usage in the config.php file:

$mcImageManagerConfig['general.demo_msg'] = "Application is running in demonstration mode, critical functions not supported.";

Example of usage in a mc_access file:

general.demo_msg=Access is denied, application is running in demo mode.
